tagline: AI Orchestrator for Phishing Training Email Generation
description: The Phish Master is an AI orchestrator that coordinates with domain-specific agents to generate safe, educational phishing training emails. It specializes in selecting appropriate domain agents (finance, healthcare, personal) and aggregating their outputs into comprehensive phishing templates for cybersecurity training programs.
sample_query: Generate a financial phishing training email for a banking scenario with high urgency
safety_statement: This agent generates phishing templates exclusively for cybersecurity training and educational purposes. All generated content is designed to be safe, educational, and clearly marked as training material. No real phishing attacks are conducted.
